education.degree: M Tech (Online) in Electronics and Communication Engineering
Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication Engineering

Software Test Agent: Designed and implemented a comprehensive framework for AI agents to assist software test engineers, enhancing testing efficiency and accuracy
Incorporated human-in-the-loop capabilities to ensure seamless collaboration between AI agents and human testers
Integrated with MongoDB and LanceDB (Vector Database) for efficient data management and retrieval.
Enabled interactions with tools like Jama Connect, Jira, GitHub, Confluence, and PDF parsers to streamline the testing workflow
Developed an agent to create and maintain a knowledge base from various sources, utilizing a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) approach for accurate query responsesS
Created an agent to generate detailed reference documents by iteratively querying requirements and test criteria, ensuring thorough documentation
Implemented an agent to automatically generate test cases based on predefined templates, with export capabilities to Confluence and Jama.
Designed an agent to execute test cases, diagnose failures, and create detailed Jira tickets for bug tracking, distinguishing between setup issues and software bugs.
Ensured transparency and traceability through comprehensive logging and status monitoring features.
Software News: Designed and implemented a news generation mechanism based on the changes in the projects from sources such as Jama Connect, Jira, Confluence and GitHub commits
This uses the REST APIs from various sources, and summarizes the sources using LLMs.
Implemented a graph based summarization technique to retain the important updates from sources.
The updates are directly sent to MS Teams based on the configured time and frequency.
This helps software engineering teams to get focused updates across the project without any manual updates.
Cell Simulation using Physics based Neur: Implemented a Li-Ion cell simulation technique using Physics Based Neural Network
This technique is helpful in generating the test datapoints for Battery algorithm development
Optimized loss function and parallelization to increase the simulation speed and efficiency
This enabled algorithm development and test engineers to accelerate the software development process

work_experience.company: Mercedes Benz Research and Development India Pvt Ltd

Multi Core Scheduling Framework: Designed and Developed multi-core scheduling algorithm based on reinforcement learning
Developed a hybrid simulation apporoach to simulate worst case execution time and the dependencies between the software components across multiple cores.
Hybrid simulation apporoach accelerates the reinforcement learning process and reduces the hardware dependencies.

achievements: Presented Technical papers during ADI's annual GTC events.
